document_data.caption: A map of Bezantur showing the Slain Sahuagin (labeled #5).
document_data.name: Slain Sahuagin
document_data.mainbody: The '''Slain Sahuagin''' was a [[tavern]] located in the coastal city of [[Bezantur]] in [[Thay]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3870 Bezantur}}
document_data.Location: The Slain Sahuagin was located in the far southwest corner of Bezantur in the warehouse district on the waterfront with the [[Alamber Sea]].
